name: SwipSearch
slogan: Recruitment app matching candidates to job based on skills, experience & workplace values
description:
SwipSearch is a mobile app to help job seekers find their perfect job. Have you ever found a job that fits perfectly, only to find out that the company culture doesn't quite work for you and you don't fit in? SwipSearch takes your workplace cultural preferences into consideration when matching you with roles. No more wasting time sifting through the perfect role at the wrong company!  Using AI, we match you with roles based on your skills, experience and workplace values. A simple 10-minute assessment allows us to make sure we show you the right roles in the right company.

For hiring managers, we give you the opportunity to recruit on the go! We save you the hassle of sifting through hundreds of CVs by matching with candidates on our app. You could post a job on Monday and have your position filled by Friday! We reduce the time it takes to complete a recruitment campaign and ultimately save you money.

Here at SwipSearch, we believe everyone deserves to love where they work. With a simple swipe, you could be doing just that. Swipe Right to Get Hired
marketTags: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

team.title: CEO
team.name: Ricardo Sinclair
team.bioHtml: Part of the founding team of a successful restaurant in Chelmsford ( Shwings Ltd) and now Founder and CEO of SwipSearch Ltd

team.title: CTO
team.name: Said Gamal
team.bioHtml: Said joined IBM in 2019 as IT Specialist(7b band).Said joined DXC/HPE in April 2014 as TL/SA)VF Germany.Said had worked as a senior software engineer at HP/EDS.

jobs.title: CMO/Co-Founder
jobs.description:
**This is an equity only role to start with and then will develop to equity and salary.**

**We are looking for someone UK (preferably London) based only**

SwipSearch is seeking an experienced marketing guru, to help from our early stage of developing this app.

SwipSearch is currently made up for two co-founders (one in London and one in Egypt), so the founder is looking for someone who is willing to get stuck in and commit to making this business a success.

**About us**

SwipSearch is the Tinder of recruitment. Our aim is to match job seekers with roles not just based on their experience. We take your workplace culture preferences into consideration too. There's nothing worse than starting a new job, to then realise you don't quite fit in.

For recruiters and hiring managers, we give you the opportunity to recruit whilst on the go! No more having to sift through hundreds of CVs of unqualified candidates. We'll only show your ad to people that match your requirements. This in turn reduces recruitment time and costs. 

It's time to change the way we recruit...swipe right to get hired.

**Responsibilities**

We are looking for a marketing guru (preferably London based) who has experience in leading successful. marketing campaigns. 

Your role will include:

Lead the customer discovery process to find a market, message and value proposition that resonates with our target audience
Create strategic messaging and generate initial demand
Test and optimize demand channels
Develop insightful data from market research and workshops
Using web analytics to better understand our target market and create campaigns based on this information
Identify the most effective marketing campaigns, working with the CEO to execute
Create the framework for business development and lead generation
Lead the marketing function to deliver against the company objectives
Skills and Experience

You have built a successful marketing function from scratch 
You are customer focused
Have experience in developing effective SEO strategies
Experience in the use of Photoshop and social media marketing
You are experienced in writing effective content for ads as well as websites
Thorough knowledge of marketing principles
You are comfortable with building brand awareness and testing different channels
You are a multichannel marketer but especially comfortable with digital marketing
You are flexible and keen to learn
You are happy to roll your sleeves up and get stuck into an early growth startup

**Ideal Profile**

You are an experienced marketer not only excited to be part of a small 
startup co-founding team, but also motivated by personal ambition. You are flexible and learn quickly. As a co-founder, you will have tremendous ownership and responsibility for marketing and the overall image of the business. Communication will be key since we will be mainly working remotely. The two co-founders is laid-back, yet focused on working to build something big and hopes you will have an interest in a startup culture and believe in their vision as well.

Unfortunately, a salary is not possible at the moment as we still in the process of trying to raise funding.

We are ideally looking for a London based CMO, who can work closely with the CEO in a co-working space.
